Package controller

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    Notifier  
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AdminMgr
    Class that manages the list of existing admins
    CommunicationController
    Class that manages the notifications to be sent to student and admin
    CourseMgr
    Class that manages the list of all existing courses
    EmailMgr
    Class that is responsible for sending emails to students and admins
    FileMgr
    Class that is responsible for saving lists of objects in a file and loading objects from a file
    IndexMgr
    Class that manages the list of indices for a particular course
    LoginMgr
    Class that handles the functionality for logging in and creating new login details
    ObjectEntityController
    Abstract class that can be used for managing list of objects of a particular type
    RegistrationManager
    Class that is responsible for handling registration matters.
    StudentRecordsMgr
    Controller class that holds objects of the Student class and performs certains operations on them
    SystemMgr
    Class that performs some system checks
    TimeTableMgr
    Class that manages the timetable of a student Checks the timing clashes between indexes
    UpdateManager
    This class contains methods that update associations and compositions When the Course code or Index number details are updated, the List of indexes present in the student object should also be updated
